subject.normal: [PATCH v3] gpio: driver for PrimeCell PL061 GPIO controller

headers.subject: Re: [PATCH v3] gpio: driver for PrimeCell PL061 GPIO controller
headers.received: (majordomo@vger.kernel.org) by vger.kernel.org via listexpand id S1753806AbZFCDVi (ORCPT <rfc822;archive.user.1834@a.markmail.org>); Tue, 2 Jun 2009 23:21:38 -0400

from tango.tkos.co.il ([62.219.50.35]:50120 "EHLO tango.tkos.co.il" rhost-flags-OK-OK-OK-OK) by vger.kernel.org with ESMTP id S1752892AbZFCDV2 (ORCPT <rfc822;linux-kernel@vger.kernel.org>); Tue, 2 Jun 2009 23:21:28 -0400
headers.x-virus-scanned: ClamAV version 0.93.1, clamav-milter version 0.93.1 on tango.tkos.co.il

body.para: On Tue, Jun 02, 2009 at 04:09:02PM -0700, Andrew Morton wrote:

quote.quotepara: On Tue, 2 Jun 2009 23:48:10 +0300 Baruch Siach <baruch@tkos.co.il> wrote:
This is a driver for the ARM PrimeCell PL061 GPIO AMBA peripheral. The driver is implemented using the gpiolib framework.

drivers/gpio/pl061.c: In function 'pl061_probe': drivers/gpio/pl061.c:254: error: 'SZ_4K' undeclared (first use in this function) drivers/gpio/pl061.c:254: error: (Each undeclared identifier is reported only
once drivers/gpio/pl061.c:254: error: for each function it appears in.) drivers/gpio/pl061.c:306: error: implicit declaration of function
'set_irq_flags' drivers/gpio/pl061.c:306: error: 'IRQF_VALID' undeclared (first use in this
function)
I'll put a depends-on-ARM in there...

body.para: I guess a depends-on-ARM_AMBA would be better.
